casebody.data:
Christopher C. CONA, Individually and as a Class Representative on Behalf of Others Similarly Situated, Plaintiff,
v.
TOWNSHIP OF WASHINGTON, Defendant. Sharon Downs, Individually and as a Class Representative on Behalf of Others Similarly Situated, Plaintiff,
v.
Borough of Paulsboro, Defendant. William R. Brody and Kathleen D. O'Hara, Individually and on Behalf of Others Similarly Situated, Plaintiffs-Petitioners,
v.
City of Woodbury, Borough of Westville, Borough of Glassboro, Borough of National Park, Township of Deptford, Defendants-Respondents. C-612 September Term 2018
081880 Supreme Court of New Jersey. February 8, 2019

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-5067/5615-15 and A-0443-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
